replies.body: Is Taric gay?... i mean look at that v-neck, it's outrageous... AND HIS GLORIOUS HAIR WTF XD

You know it, and that "flower" in his lore that he needs to "save" is Ezreal, his one and only love. 

Taric, now includes:
Blow kisses
Photoshoots
Hair swishing
Hair swishing
Hair ruffling
Beckoning
Now with even more Ezreal love
And much much more
Hi Riot, I redeemed a 25AUD RP card this morning but the amount did not appear on my account. Then I saw the RP purchase temporarily unavailable sign. What do I do now, and when will I get my RP?
you won't, it said don't do it, if you are lucky they will refund all codes and you can use it again, if not your problem
